A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat-loving elderly neighbor, Lucy Caroline Fenshag. The old hag has an encounter with the local priest, Father Michael Logan (Michael Ontkean), one night while she is taking care of her sick sister's mice. She trades a soul for 10 years of youth.
